data.author: Arne Nordmann
data.message:
Un-string-ify micro-ROS diagnostics

Refactors micro-ROS diagnostic status to work without arrays and without strings. Added a new package micro_ros_diagnostic_bridge, which provides a ROS 2 node to run on the micro processor and translate micro-ROS diagnostic messages to vanilla ROS 2 diagnostic messages based on a lookup table.

data.author: Nordmann Arne (CR/ADT3)

Merge branch 'master' into feature/un-string-ify

data.author: Nordmann Arne (CR/ADT3)
data.message:
ROS2 diagnostic bridge

ROS C++ resp. rclcpp package with a diagnostic bridge node that
subscribes to micro-ROS diagnostic messages and translates them
to stringified vanilla ROS2 diagnstic messages using a
lookup table.

https://github.com/micro-ROS/micro_ros_diagnostics/issues/5

Signed-off-by: Nordmann Arne (CR/ADT3) <arne.nordmann@de.bosch.com>
